name: Bruce Goes to Sleep (Chapter 1 of the Bruce the Dog Saga)
name_original: Bruce Goes to Sleep (Chapter 1 of the Bruce the Dog Saga)
description:
Bruce works nights as a security guard. The job is not very rewarding, nor is it demanding, yet it is taxing on his health. He rarely spends time with others or goes outside during the day, as such he is an individual of great inner torment. Now, you can experience that torment through cutting edge "Videoized-Game™" technology!

The first installment in the Bruce saga.
